abs: The idea of applying the cognitive radar principle to the forest characterization is presented. It implies an adaptive design of experiments (DOE) that will allow us to construct approximate models. These models reduce the computational cost, which is mandatory when running many numerical simulations in various configurations.
title: Cognitive radar applied to forest and kriging-based metamodel
